name: Moonfire Pendant
description: A silver pendant adorned with a milky-white stone, rumored to be blessed by the Goddess of Moon.
examine_text: The pendant shimmers softly under light, the silver chain wound intricately around its milky-white stone. The stone is cold to touch yet feels strangely reassuring, akin to the gentle glow of moonlight on a starry night. An engraving on the back reads: Blessed by the Moon.

name: Leviathan Fang
description: A gargantuan fang extracted from a Leviathan. Often used as a decoration or a weapon by the ocean tribes.
examine_text: A monstrous fang that must have belonged to a creature of immense size. Sharper than any blade, tougher than any shield, and endowed with a lustrous pearl tint, it just screams danger. But it also exudes an otherworldly beauty that stirs up a sense of awe.

name: Star Blossom Tea
description: A fragrant tea made from the leaves of the rare Star Blossom plant. Renowned for its soothing properties.
examine_text: Aren't you fortunate! You see before you renowned Star Blossom Tea - purportedly as ethereal as the stars itself. Gently brewed petals produce a warm liquid whose color mirrors the dawn sky. Its soothing fragrance of freesia lingers, while consuming this tea is said to heal, rejuvenate, and clarify one's mind.
